languages.text: "Мон-кай слабы духом — они падки к посылам Той, Что Жаждет, и в своем стремлении к отравленным дарам служат ей извращенные ритуалы... ритуалы, для которых нужны жертвы. Такие, как мон-кай, что пропадали во дворце".

traits.locale_text: "Мон-кай слабы духом — они падки к посылам Той, Что Жаждет, и в своем стремлении к отравленным дарам служат ей извращенные ритуалы... ритуалы, для которых нужны жертвы. Такие, как мон-кай, что пропадали во дворце".

languages.text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай слабы духом — они падки к посылам Той, Что Жаждет, и в своем стремлении к отравленным дарам служат ей извращенные ритуалы... ритуалы, для которых нужны жертвы. Такие, как мон-кай, что пропадали во дворце".

traits.locale_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

"The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

"The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

"The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイの精神は脆弱だ。かの渇きたる女の誘いに乗りやすく、毒入りの贈り物を求めてはその名のもとに倒錯的な儀式を行う…その儀式で必要になるのが生け贄だ。宮殿に連行されたまま姿を消したモン＝ケイのような」
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイの精神は脆弱だ。かの渇きたる女の誘いに乗りやすく、毒入りの贈り物を求めてはその名のもとに倒錯的な儀式を行う…その儀式で必要になるのが生け贄だ。宮殿に連行されたまま姿を消したモン＝ケイのような」

languages.text: “猴子们的精神非常脆弱，很容易被饥渴女士的提议所迷惑。为了得到沾满了她的毒液的礼物，他们正以她的名义，举行着令人作呕的仪式……需要献祭的仪式。那些猴子被带到了宫殿里，之后再也没人见过他们。”
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: “猴子们的精神非常脆弱，很容易被饥渴女士的提议所迷惑。为了得到沾满了她的毒液的礼物，他们正以她的名义，举行着令人作呕的仪式……需要献祭的仪式。那些猴子被带到了宫殿里，之后再也没人见过他们。”

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh son de espíritu débil, susceptibles a las tentaciones de la Sedienta; y en su afán por obtener sus ponzoñosos dones, celebran rituales perversos en su nombre... rituales que exigen sacrificios. Como esos mon-keigh que se llevaron al palacio y a los que ya nunca más se volvió a ver».
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh son de espíritu débil, susceptibles a las tentaciones de la Sedienta; y en su afán por obtener sus ponzoñosos dones, celebran rituales perversos en su nombre... rituales que exigen sacrificios. Como esos mon-keigh que se llevaron al palacio y a los que ya nunca más se volvió a ver».

languages.text: "Der Geist der Chem-Pan-Sey ist schwach – sie sind empfänglich für die Vorschläge von Ihr, die dürstet, und um ihre vergifteten Geschenke zu erlangen, führen sie in ihrem Namen abartige Rituale durch ... Rituale, die Opfer erfordern. Wie die Chem-Pan-Sey, die zum Palast gebracht und dann nie wieder gesehen wurden."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: "Der Geist der Chem-Pan-Sey ist schwach – sie sind empfänglich für die Vorschläge von Ihr, die dürstet, und um ihre vergifteten Geschenke zu erlangen, führen sie in ihrem Namen abartige Rituale durch ... Rituale, die Opfer erfordern. Wie die Chem-Pan-Sey, die zum Palast gebracht und dann nie wieder gesehen wurden."

languages.text: « L'esprit des mon-keigh est faible ; ils se laissent tenter par les propositions de l'Assoiffée et, poussés par leur désir de recevoir ses cadeaux empoisonnés, ils s'adonnent en son nom à des rituels malsains... nécessitant des sacrifices. Comme ces mon-keigh qui ont été conduits au palais pour ne plus jamais en ressortir. »
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: « L'esprit des mon-keigh est faible ; ils se laissent tenter par les propositions de l'Assoiffée et, poussés par leur désir de recevoir ses cadeaux empoisonnés, ils s'adonnent en son nom à des rituels malsains... nécessitant des sacrifices. Comme ces mon-keigh qui ont été conduits au palais pour ne plus jamais en ressortir. »

languages.text: "Mon-keigh ruhen zayıftır, Susayan'ın ayartmalarına açıktır. Zehirli armağanlarına ulaşma dürtüsüyle onun adına sapkın, kurban sunulan ayinler yaparlar. Saraya getirilen ve bir daha izine rastlanmayan mon-keigh gibi kurbanlar..."
languages.original_text: "The mon-keigh are weak in spirit — they are susceptible to the propositions of She Who Thirsts, and in their drive to attain her poisoned gifts, they perform perverse rituals in her name... rituals that require sacrifices. Like the mon-keigh who were brought to the palace and never seen again."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh ruhen zayıftır, Susayan'ın ayartmalarına açıktır. Zehirli armağanlarına ulaşma dürtüsüyle onun adına sapkın, kurban sunulan ayinler yaparlar. Saraya getirilen ve bir daha izine rastlanmayan mon-keigh gibi kurbanlar..."
